trans-unit.source: Maintains a data model for the value of a property in the property grid.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> class with the parent property set to a specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> that corresponds to this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref> can be converted from a string.
`true` if the property value can be converted from a string; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether exceptions thrown during property value getting and setting should be caught or should be propagated directly to the caller.
This is based upon whether there are any subscribers to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException> event.
`true` if exceptions are caught; `false` if exceptions are propagated to the caller.
When implemented in a derived class, clears the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> so that it is unset.

When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instances that correspond to items in a collection when <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection"></xref> verifies that the property is a collection.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"></xref> object that is a collection of property value instances.

When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> value to convert to a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> value.

When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref> to convert to a string.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> version of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref>.
A property value <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the type of this property supports sub-properties.
Typical implementations will use a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> to verify whether sub-properties exist.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that, when <xref href="System.Boolean.True"></xref>, verifies that the type supports sub-properties, otherwise <xref href="System.Boolean.False"></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> is a collection.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that, when <xref href="System.Boolean.True"></xref>, verifies that the property value is a collection, otherwise <xref href="System.Boolean.False"></xref>.

When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref> is the default value for the property.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that, when <xref href="System.Boolean.True"></xref>, verifies that the value is the default, otherwise <xref href="System.Boolean.False"></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether multiple objects contain this property and have different values.

If `true`, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A> will return null and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A> will return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
`true` if multiple objects contain this property; otherwise, `false`.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.RootValueChanged"></xref> event when the underlying value type is changed externally, as on the design surface.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.SubPropertyChanged"></xref> event when one of the sub-properties of this property has changed.

Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"></xref> event with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref> objects.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that provides the name of the property that changed.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"></xref> event that uses the name of the property that changed.
The name of the property that changed.

Default implementation that raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException"></xref> event when <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> properties experience failure getting or setting values in the underlying collection of data.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs"></xref> that provides information about the get or set failure that occurred.
Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> when the property implementation occurs in a host environment.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> object that represents the parent property.
Occurs when properties or sub-properties of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object has changed.
Event used by host implementations for error handling.

Occurs when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref> or <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue"></xref> property is updated as a result of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> value being changed.
When implemented in a derived class, sets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref>.
The object to be set in the underlying collection of data.

When implemented in a derived class, gets a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"></xref> object that contains information about where this property value is coming from.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"></xref> object that contains property value source information.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref> as a <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> version of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value"></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of sub-properties as <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> instances.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntryCollection"></xref> of instances.
Occurs when sub-properties are updated as a result of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> being changed.
When implemented in a derived class, throws an exception if verification of the specified value object shows it to be invalid.
The object whose value is verified.
Gets or sets a property value in the underlying collection of property data.
A property value <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
